asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

unstyled.description: Whether to remove the component's style.

autoFocus.description: Whether to auto-focus the first input.

blurOnComplete.description: Whether to blur the input when the value is complete

count.description:
The number of inputs to render to improve SSR aria attributes.
This will be required in next major version.

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the the pin input when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the pin input.

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  hiddenInput: string
  label: string
  control: string
  input(id: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the pin input. Useful for composition.

invalid.description: Whether the pin input is in the invalid state

mask.description: If `true`, the input's value will be masked just like `type=password`

name.description: The name of the input element. Useful for form submission.

onValueComplete.description: Function called when all inputs have valid values

onValueInvalid.description: Function called when an invalid value is entered

otp.description:
If `true`, the pin input component signals to its fields that they should
use `autocomplete="one-time-code"`.

pattern.description: The regular expression that the user-entered input value is checked against.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text for the input

readOnly.description: Whether the pin input is in the valid state

required.description: Whether the pin input is required

selectOnFocus.description: Whether to select input value when input is focused

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

type.description: The type of value the pin-input should allow

value.description: The controlled value of the the pin input.

colorPalette.description: The color palette of the component

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
